mapper.select: select c.*, u.*, k.*,r.*,rm.* from children c left join user u on u.user_key = c.parent_key left join kindermatch km on c.child_key = km.child_key left join kinder k on km.kinder_key = k.kinder_key left join recordmatch rm on km.km_key = rm.km_key left join record r on rm.RECORD_KEY=r.RECORD_KEY where c.child_key in ( select child_key from kindermatch where km_key in ( select km_key from recordmatch where record_key = #{recordKey} ) )
select count(*) from USER where user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(user_id,user_pw,user_name, user_birth,user_postcode,user_address, user_address_detail,user_type,user_phone) VALUES(#{userId},#{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userBirth},#{userPostcode},#{userAddress}, #{userAddressDetail},#{userType},#{userPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT k.* FROM DRIVEINFO di JOIN RECORD r ON r.DRIVE_INFO_KEY = di.DRIVE_INFO_KEY JOIN RECORDMATCH rm ON r.RECORD_KEY = rm.RECORD_KEY JOIN KINDERMATCH km ON rm.KM_KEY = km.KM_KEY JOIN KINDER k ON km.KINDER_KEY = k.KINDER_KEY WHERE di.USER_KEY = #{driverKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRIVEINFO (DRIVE_INFO_NAME, DRIVE_CAR_NAME, USER_KEY) VALUES (#{driveInfoName}, #{driveCarName}, #{userKey})
mapper.select: select drive_info_key from driveInfo where drive_info_name like concat('%',#{time},'%')

SELECT km.km_key, r.record_key FROM kinder k JOIN user u ON k.kinder_postcode = u.user_postcode AND u.user_address_detail = k.KINDER_NAME JOIN kindermatch km ON km.kinder_key = k.kinder_key JOIN driveinfo di ON di.user_key = u.user_key JOIN record r ON r.drive_info_key = di.drive_info_key WHERE u.user_type = 'D' AND km.km_pickup = 'Y'
AND r.record_start_time >= TIMESTAMP(CURDATE(), ' 00:00:00')
AND r.record_start_time <= TIMESTAMP(CURDATE(), ' 23:59:59')
